topic.title: Additional properties in OBSH files

body.p: The following brine and polymer components concentration properties have been added to the list of data mnemonics recognized by OBSH files:
The component name is appended with double quotes in square brackets: COMPONENT_EQUIV_CONC["NaCl"]

After INTERSECT loads one of these properties from the OBSH file, it is assigned to the corresponding well. INTERSECT automatically generates an external fluid source for each well with concentration inputs. The Composition field in the FluidSourceExternal node is then populated with the historical data. The external fluid source created is assigned to the corresponding water injector well under the InjectionStream field in the Well node.
